description: Sony Lawyer David Boies: Obama's Response 'Blamed The Victim'
title: Sony Lawyer: Obama's Response 'Blamed The Victim'
title_page: Sony Lawyer: Obama's Response 'Blamed The Victim' | Breitbart
text:
Sunday on NBC’s “Meet the Press,” the attorney for Sony Pictures, David Boies, said President Obama is “blaming the victim” in North Korea’s hacking attack on Sony.
Boies said, “This is a state-sponsored criminal attack on a private corporation and its employees. If the NSA had invaded somebody like this, the people would have been outraged. North Korea does it and couples it with threats, and people sit back while Sony fights this on its own.” He added, “I would have liked to have seen it earlier. I would have liked to have seen it without the ‘blame-the-victim aspect’ of it.
